description: President Biden and Vice President Harris traveled to Georgia and North Carolina to reassure people that help is on the way. Making good on that promise is a critical test in this election year.
title: Harris and Biden surveyed damage wrought by Hurricane Helene in 2 swing states

description: Across Eastern Tennessee, people are connecting on social media to help clear out ruined furniture, scrub off mud, and deliver jugs of water so people can flush toilets.
title: On a Tennessee street hit hard by Helene flooding, strangers show up to help

description: Prosecutors provided the most detailed look yet at their election interference case against former President Donald Trump.
title: Judge unseals new Trump Jan. 6 election interference evidence

description: Jamie McDonald has provided meals in Ukraine and Turkey as a volunteer with World Central Kitchen. Now, he's partnering with the global charity led by José Andrés to feed residents in Asheville.
title: After helping in war and quake zones, this restaurateur feeds residents hit by Helene

description: As China celebrates 75 years of Communist Party rule, there is a fight over who gets to tell the history of those years. The party would prefer to make sure the story is a positive one and is exerting power to control that narrative. One high profile example of that is playing out far away, in California.
title: The Fight Over Who Writes the History of Modern China

description: An appeals court sided with Uber, ruling a couple can't sue over a near-fatal car crash because they had agreed to Uber Eats' arbitration clause. Their lawyer is worried about a "slippery slope."
title: A court blocks a couple from suing Uber over a car crash because of Uber Eats' terms

description: Videos posted online suggest that two air bases were targeted by multiple incoming missiles. The strike appears to have been more sophisticated than one earlier this year.
title: How Iran’s missile strike on Israel appears to have hit some targets

description: Supplemental Security Income provides the medical care that lets people work. But its rules are complex and out of date.
title: This disabled woman built a career. A federal program that helped now penalizes her

description: The death toll reported from an average tropical cyclone is 24. But the true toll is maybe 300 times higher—and the losses stretch for years after the storm passes.
title: Hurricanes contribute to thousands of deaths each year in the U.S.—many times the reported number

description: The three-time Oscar winner announced the end of his acting career in 2017. The new film, Anemone, will be directed by the actor’s son, Ronan Day-Lewis, from a script that the pair co-wrote together.
title: Daniel Day-Lewis ends 7-year retirement to act in his son's film

description: The Nintendo Museum opens in Kyoto, Japan, today. Mario and Zelda creator Shigeru Miyamoto never expected the company to make the museum, since it has an ethos of letting its games speak for themselves.
title: Nintendo shows off Mario, Zelda, and 135 years of history in a new Kyoto museum

description: JD Vance and Tim Walz faced off in last night's vice presidential debate. NPR has fact-checked their claims and broken down the details. And, Biden will assess N.C.'s recovery after Hurricane Helene.
title: Fact-checking the Vance-Walz debate. And, Biden to assess N.C. after Hurricane Helene

description: Coastal cities often bear the brunt of hurricanes. But as Hurricane Helene showed, extreme rainfall can be life-threatening hundreds of miles away.
title: Hurricanes are dangerous far from the coast. Communities are struggling to prepare

description: The anniversary of the October 7th attack on Israel takes place during the Jewish High Holy Days. It's a time of ending things that need to be ended in order begin things that need to be begun.
title: October 7th anniversary weighs heavy as Jews enter the High Holy Days

description: Vice presidential candidates are unlikely to make a fundamental difference in this election, but there were some takeaways from an interesting night.
title: Who is the real JD Vance? And 4 other takeaways from the vice-presidential debate

description: The U.S. State Department said it was “deeply troubled” by the recent arrest of Mech Dara, an award-winning Cambodian investigative reporter who exposed online scams and corruption.
title: A Cambodian reporter who exposed scams is charged over online posts

description: JD Vance and Tim Walz debated on Tuesday in the last scheduled debate of the election. The sparring was mostly collegial but a number of points on key issues require additional context or corrections.
title: NPR fact checked the Vance-Walz vice presidential debate. Here's what we found

description: JD Vance spoke of workers and the impact of immigration, while Tim Walz decried dehumanizing rhetoric.
title: Vance leaves the cat and dog claims behind as he battles Walz over immigration

description: Democratic VP hopeful Tim Walz called his response a "damning non answer."
title: 'A damning non answer': Vance refuses to say whether Trump lost in 2020 at debate

description: The disparate philosophies between Tim Walz and JD Vance on law and order and ensuring public safety in the U.S. were on display in the presidential debate.
title: On the VP debate stage, two visions for policing in America were laid out
